mapper.insert: insert into rsvt values (#{rsvt_no}, #{prd_dtl_cd}, #{usr_id},#{prd_cd}, #{mn_rsvt_nm}, #{phn}, #{email}, #{sum_prc}, #{pay_ftr_prc}, #{req_cont}, #{cmn_cd_rsvt_stt},#{cmn_cd_pay_stt}, now(), #{cnc_pay_no}, #{adt_cnt}, #{chd_cnt}, #{bb_cnt}, now(), #{usr_id}, now(), #{usr_id})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM rsvt WHERE usr_id = #{usr_id}

SELECT r.rsvt_no, r.rsvt_date, r.cmn_cd_rsvt_stt, r.pay_ftr_prc, r.prd_dtl_cd, r.cmn_cd_pay_stt, r.sum_prc, tp.prd_nm, tp.prd_dtl_desc FROM rsvt r INNER JOIN trv_prd tp ON r.prd_cd = tp.prd_cd WHERE r.usr_id = #{usr_id} LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update rsvt set cmn_cd_rsvt_stt = #{cmn_cd_rsvt_stt} where rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no}
mapper.select: SELECT d.prd_dtl_cd, d.arl_nm, t.dstn_cd, t.prd_nm, t.trv_per, p.prd_cd,p.adt_prc, p.chd_prc, p.bb_prc FROM trv_prd_dtl d JOIN trv_prd t ON d.prd_cd = t.prd_cd JOIN prd_prc p ON d.prd_cd = p.prd_cd WHERE d.prd_dtl_cd = #{prd_dtl_cd} and p.prd_dtl_cd = #{prd_dtl_cd};

select r.rsvt_date, r.rsvt_no, r.prd_dtl_cd, r.adt_cnt, r.chd_cnt, r.bb_cnt, r.sum_prc, r.cmn_cd_rsvt_stt, r.pay_ftr_prc, tp.prd_nm, tp.prd_cd, tp.trv_per from rsvt r INNER JOIN trv_prd tp on r.prd_cd = tp.prd_cd where r.rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no};
select mlg from usr where usr_id = #{usr_id};
select pay_ftr_prc from rsvt where rsvt_no = #{rsvt_no};
